help: **-ft map** - View a map of available timezones.
**-ft set <timezone>** - Set yourself to a timezone.

**Note**: For best results use a timezone in the format **<country>/<city>**. You can see a map of the available cities with **-ft map**. Using a timezone abbreviation like *EST* or *GMT* may have unintended results during daylight savings.
map: Please visit the following link and choose your timezone:
Then enter **-ft set <timezone>** with your timezone.
**Note**: For best results use a timezone in the format **<country>/<city>**. Using a timezone abbreviation like *EST* or *GMT* may have unintended results during daylight savings.
msg.notAllowedInDm: This command doesn't work in direct messages. Try again in a server channel.
noTimezoneProvided: Type **-ft map** to view a map of available timezones.
invalidTimezone: Type **-ft map** to view a map of available timezones.
timezoneNotSet: Hi {USERNAME}, it looks like you don't have a timezone set yet.
Please type **-ft map** to view a map of available timezones.
Then type **-ft set <timezone>** to set yourself to that timezone.

log.clientError: The discord client WebSocket encountered a connection error.
log.dblServerCountPosted: Server count posted to Discord Bot List!
log.dblError: An error occured with Discord Bot List.
log.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check that you've placed the correct discord bot token in the config file.
log.serverConnected: '{SERVER_NAME}' ({SERVER_ID}) connected! There are now {SERVER_COUNT} connected servers.
log.serverDisconnected: '{SERVER_NAME}' ({SERVER_ID}) disconnected. There are now {SERVER_COUNT} connected servers.
log.userSetTimezone: User '{USERNAME}' ({USER_ID}) set their timezone to '{TIMEZONE}' in '{SERVER_NAME}' ({SERVER_ID}).
